p: The explanatory variables selected in this study were mainly selected by reading the relevant literature [ 18â€“ 20, 29, 38] and combining that knowledge with the actual available data, including 11 variables such as the population, population density, GDP, per capita GDP, number of kindergartens, number of public kindergartens, number of private kindergartens, concentration of SO 2, concentration of NO 2, concentration of PM 10, and concentration of O 3.
